SUPPORTING OUR  
LOCAL COMMUNITIES
39
Making Life Better 1
 2
 3
Amyris is committed to having a positive impact on the 
local communities in which we live and work by donating 
our time, talents and resources to help organizations 
serving vital needs. We are also focused on supporting 
initiatives to protect our planet, including promoting 
sustainability, advocacy and innovation.
62020 Inaugural ESG Report
